Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1007.jpg'}
{3: "You follow Alpha into a secluded monk's chamber. It's neat and orderly inside, though a thin layer of dust shows it hasn't been lived in for quite a while."}
{3: "As soon as you're out of the wind and snow, your body warms up considerably, and your mind finally starts working properly again."}
{3: "To start off our partnership, you give Alpha a vague explanation that you're here on monastery business. You figure an Ascendant probably has no desire to claim such a harsh place."}
{2: 'Why are you here?', 3: '7'}
{3: 'Alpha blows the dust off and leans casually against the wall, looking quite satisfied with her new appearance.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: "I have some ties to this monastery. There's a troublesome Corrupted in the main hall that can apparently mess with M.I.N.D.", 4: '101', 18: '100005182', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'The people here sealed off all the main roads before they left.', 4: '101', 18: '100005183', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{3: "The hall's doors are tightly shut, debris is scattered everywhere, and there's nobody in sight. So that's what's causing the trouble."}
{3: 'The monastery is so expansive. It might take some extra effort to find a path to the main hall.'}
{3: 'Alpha looks annoyed, gently pressing her forehead.'}
{2: "No wonder you're so familiar with this place.", 3: '18', 4: 'No wonder about your outfit.', 5: '18'}
{3: "She makes no denial. Her tone stays casual, like she's just chatting about the weather."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "If I didn't run into you, I'd be barging right in and grabbing what I need.", 4: '101', 18: '100005185', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: "It seems we can't achieve our goals until we take out that Corrupted.", 3: '23'}
{2: "Let's explore around together, to get things done faster.", 3: '24'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I don't doubt... you have what it takes.", 4: '101', 18: '100005186', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{3: 'Alpha deliberately steps closer, as if she wants to intimidate you. She keeps her gaze on you for so long that you start feeling uneasy.'}

{3: "She runs her left hand through her hair at her right temple, then returns it to her blade. She doesn't protest, so you take it as a yes. You treasure every bit of trust you're building together."}
{2: 'Those refugees... I heard them calling you "Boss"?', 3: '33'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: 'I just slashed through a few pesky pieces of scrap metal on my way here. Whatever they do after that is none of my business.', 4: '101', 18: '100005187', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{3: 'Alpha bluntly ends the discussion, refusing to elaborate. Still, from her few carefully chosen words, you can piece together the core of the matter.'}
{2: 'Those figures dressed in monk robes over black clothes... who are they?', 3: '37'}

{2: 'Alpha', 3: "They might be tied to the former abbot of this monastery. I'm not certain about the details, but they're after that blade as well.", 4: '101', 18: '100005188', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Heh, they're overestimating themselves.", 4: '101', 18: '100005189', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Just an odd old man—don't worry about him.", 4: '101', 18: '100005190', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Those people aren't exactly friendly, so keep that in mind.", 4: '101', 18: '100005191', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{3: 'It seems she came here to take away that blade.'}
{3: 'You still want to ask more questions, but Alpha suddenly pushes you back with the hilt of her blade.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: "All right, you deal with the human side of things. I'll handle our nonhuman guest.", 4: '101', 18: '100005192', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory55.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before you know it, Alpha is gone, leaving you by yourself at the entrance to the chamber, trading uneasy glances with a handful of refugees.'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: "Hmm, where's Boss? I just saw her come in here...", 4: '101', 18: '100005193', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: "Hey, you're the one Boss took on her motorcycle!", 4: '101', 18: '100005195', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}

{2: 'Refugee A', 3: "Man, I'm so jealous! That motorcycle looks amazing. We only tried to sneak a closer look, but Boss nearly killed us with one glare. And you actually got to sit on it!", 4: '101', 18: '100005196', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: "Whoa, no wonder you're with Boss!", 4: '102', 18: '100005197', 19: '2', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{3: "These two refugees haven't seen a friendly face in ages, so they chatter nonstop, overflowing with excitement as they introduce themselves."}
{2: 'Toure', 3: 'I\'m Toure! And this is "Iron Skull". Since you\'re with Boss, that makes you our buddy now!', 4: '101', 18: '100005198', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: '"Iron Skull"', 3: "We're looking to thank Boss!", 4: '102', 18: '100005199', 19: '2', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{3: "You instinctively want to give a denial, but you decide it's better to keep quiet and gather some information first."}
{2: 'So, are you from the monastery?', 3: '67'}
{2: 'Toure', 3: 'Of course not! The monastery was hit by the Corrupted before, and they had all the monks leave. This place is deserted now.', 4: '101', 18: '100005200', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: 'But what about those wearing monk robes...?', 3: '69'}

{2: 'Toure', 3: "They're from Wuming, and they're definitely trouble. They must've been pushed out of Wuming, or they wouldn't come to a hole like this.", 4: '101', 18: '100005202', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}

{2: '"Iron Skull"', 3: "They're practically begging for a beating. They keep insisting the sword belongs to their boss, calling it theirs. Don't be fooled by the monk getup—they're putting on a show.", 4: '102', 18: '100005203', 19: '2', 21: 'v215alpha'}

{2: 'Toure', 3: "Didn't you see them? They've seized the side hall with blades and spears, itching for a fight. If Iron Skull doesn't stay sharp, we're finished...", 4: '101', 18: '100005204', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: "Hold on. What's this sword you're talking about?", 3: '74'}
{2: 'Toure', 3: "Oh well, that's quite a story to tell!", 4: '101', 18: '100005205', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}

{2: 'Toure', 3: "They say this monastery's abbot was a supreme martial arts master. Before leaving, he hid an incredibly sharp blade behind the giant Buddha in the main hall—it slices through the Corrupted like vegetables!", 4: '101', 18: '100005206', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: 'Toure', 3: "If you don't believe me, go take a look. The back mountain is covered with Corrupted remains!", 4: '101', 18: '100005207', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: '"Iron Skull"', 3: "But if that blade is really so sharp, why didn't the old man deal with the monster in the main hall himself?", 4: '102', 18: '100005208', 19: '2', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: 'Toure', 3: 'Sigh, I figure he was just too old for that.', 4: '101', 18: '100005209', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: 'Toure', 3: 'We were hoping to grab that priceless treasure ourselves, maybe trade it for something valuable...', 4: '101', 18: '100005210', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: 'Toure', 3: "Ha, but you know what? I'd rather keep my life.", 4: '101', 18: '100005211', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: '"Iron Skull"', 3: "I mean, come on. We're only human—how are we supposed to stand up to machines that don't feel pain and don't fear death?", 4: '102', 18: '100005212', 19: '2', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: "Since we all want the same thing, let's sit down and work it out.", 3: '83', 4: 'We still need to handle the Corrupted in the end.', 5: '83'}
{2: 'Toure', 3: "Yeah, you're right. Going head-to-head with those people doesn't solve anything, and we can't really win anyway.", 4: '101', 18: '100005213', 19: '1', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{2: '"Iron Skull"', 3: "So Boss sent you to help us, right? She really takes good care of us! We're counting on you—we trust anyone Boss trusts!", 4: '102', 18: '100005214', 19: '2', 21: 'v215alpha'}
{3: "You may have gone with the flow at first, but now it's turning into a real hassle..."}
